function evaluateProperty({

}) {
    let date = api.state.datefilter;

    if (date) {

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-07 23:48:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>d475ea19934e421012c174dcebba1036</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>list_1/query</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CSM and FSM Configurable Workspace Foundation" source="sn_cwf_wrkspc">27b568be53b11010d4f9ddeeff7b12c5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CSM and FSM Configurable Workspace Foundation">27b568be53b11010d4f9ddeeff7b12c5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d475ea19934e421012c174dcebba1036</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-07 23:48:29</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
